name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】DISASTERSHOW ｜｜ Disasterpiece Release Mini Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #disastershow #calliolive [fuQ7VpAVFr4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope talks to her audience (Dead Beats) about her album, outfit history, and social media trends.
Mori Calliope performs her song 'end of line'.

subtitles.original: W-wait... making an angry face?
subtitles.english: W-wait... making an angry face?

subtitles.original: Fuck you!
subtitles.english: Fuck you!

subtitles.original: Ooh! Check out my nails!
subtitles.english: Ooh! Check out my nails!

subtitles.original: Even cats hide their claws.
subtitles.english: Even cats hide their claws.

subtitles.original: Hey! This is a cute little screenshot too.
subtitles.english: Hey! This is a cute little screenshot too.

subtitles.original: I heard from my P-san, my P-san showed a little piece of paper to me...
subtitles.english: I heard from my P-san, my P-san showed a little piece of paper to me...

subtitles.original: ...that said that #disastershow entered the trends in USA.
subtitles.english: ...that said that #disastershow entered the trends in USA.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for that!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for that!

subtitles.original: Dead Beats, keep it coming, and some folks are like...
subtitles.english: Dead Beats, keep it coming, and some folks are like...

subtitles.original: "Mori, I can't believe this is free!"
subtitles.english: "Mori, I can't believe this is free!"

subtitles.original: Of course it's free, 'cause I know that the majority of you guys bought the album...
subtitles.english: Of course it's free, 'cause I know that the majority of you guys bought the album...

subtitles.original: ...so it might as well be free.
subtitles.english: ...so it might as well be free.

subtitles.original: Um, and if you didn't buy it, you at least have been streaming it.
subtitles.english: Um, and if you didn't buy it, you at least have been streaming it.

subtitles.original: So it just, it just feels right, I guess...
subtitles.english: So it just, it just feels right, I guess...

subtitles.original: ...to do what I can to make it worth it to you guys, even more so.
subtitles.english: ...to do what I can to make it worth it to you guys, even more so.

subtitles.original: Hi! You guys remember this outfit?
subtitles.english: Hi! You guys remember this outfit?

subtitles.original: It's a little on the older side, but check it out, you guys remember, right?
subtitles.english: It's a little on the older side, but check it out, you guys remember, right?

subtitles.original: From my very first solo show, "New Underworld Order".
subtitles.english: From my very first solo show, "New Underworld Order".

subtitles.original: It's looking good, right? I'm looking good.
subtitles.english: It's looking good, right? I'm looking good.

subtitles.original: Hi! Hi!
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: Trying to get as much camera screen time as I can.
subtitles.english: Trying to get as much camera screen time as I can.

subtitles.original: Buy the album! Buy the album! Say the Dead Beats.
subtitles.english: Buy the album! Buy the album! Say the Dead Beats.

subtitles.original: お願いします！ If you could, I'd be very happy.
subtitles.english: Please! If you could, I'd be very happy.

subtitles.original: Whoa, this is kind of a cool shot with the Sakura.
subtitles.english: Whoa, this is kind of a cool shot with the Sakura.

subtitles.original: My eyes are glowing in the darkness. Hey there. Hi.
subtitles.english: My eyes are glowing in the darkness. Hey there. Hi.

subtitles.original: I'll keep trying to make silly faces though.
subtitles.english: I'll keep trying to make silly faces though.

subtitles.original: That's something that'll never change about me.
subtitles.english: That's something that'll never change about me.

subtitles.original: This is a screenshot moment.
subtitles.english: This is a screenshot moment.

subtitles.original: Whenever it stops, it means it's a screenshot moment. Maybe.
subtitles.english: Whenever it stops, it means it's a screenshot moment. Maybe.

subtitles.original: Anyway, it's time to move on because I still have a couple songs to sing for you guys.
subtitles.english: Anyway, it's time to move on because I still have a couple songs to sing for you guys.

subtitles.original: I think this one will end up being longer than "Dance Past Midnight", which is a good thing.
subtitles.english: I think this one will end up being longer than "Dance Past Midnight", which is a good thing.

subtitles.original: I get to sing even more for you!
subtitles.english: I get to sing even more for you!

subtitles.original: What songs will they be? I wonder.
subtitles.english: What songs will they be? I wonder.

subtitles.original: ありがとう、スタッフさん！
subtitles.english: Thank you, staff!

subtitles.original: And, uh, yeah. So, I guess it's about time that we move on to the next spot.
subtitles.english: And, uh, yeah. So, I guess it's about time that we move on to the next spot.

subtitles.original: Looking good.
subtitles.english: Looking good.

subtitles.original: Thanks Dead Beats. You want to see my high kicks I've been working on?
subtitles.english: Thanks Dead Beats. You want to see my high kicks I've been working on?

subtitles.original: おいしょ！ And...
subtitles.english: Hup! And...

subtitles.original: おいしょ！ My high kicks.
subtitles.english: Hup! My high kicks.

subtitles.original: おいしょ！ Next year I'm going to kick even higher, you'll see.
subtitles.english: Hup! Next year I'm going to kick even higher, you'll see.

subtitles.original: Anyway, that's some randomness right there.
subtitles.english: Anyway, that's some randomness right there.

subtitles.original: Let's go. Next... 変身！
subtitles.english: Let's go. Next... Transformation!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: I put my last illusions behind...
subtitles.english: I put my last illusions behind...

subtitles.original: Still you're creeping through my thoughts tonight.
subtitles.english: Still you're creeping through my thoughts tonight.

subtitles.original: Now I know it's so mis-skin deep...
subtitles.english: Now I know it's so mis-skin deep...

subtitles.original: Drawn like moths to flames inside your heat.
subtitles.english: Drawn like moths to flames inside your heat.

subtitles.original: Heat, heat.
subtitles.english: Heat, heat.

subtitles.original: Consider myself fine, but I'm christening every line...
subtitles.english: Consider myself fine, but I'm christening every line...

subtitles.original: ...drunk on love that's not mine.
subtitles.english: ...drunk on love that's not mine.

subtitles.original: Heaven sent you way too late, kiss of death and take the fate...
subtitles.english: Heaven sent you way too late, kiss of death and take the fate...

subtitles.original: ...past lives and loaded dice, white lies and alibis.
subtitles.english: ...past lives and loaded dice, white lies and alibis.

subtitles.original: Fingers tracing edges of the medicine I never swallow...
subtitles.english: Fingers tracing edges of the medicine I never swallow...

subtitles.original: ...rights don't know the enemy to fight, not in this life.
subtitles.english: ...rights don't know the enemy to fight, not in this life.

subtitles.original: Stolen whispers, don't ask and don't tell...
subtitles.english: Stolen whispers, don't ask and don't tell...

subtitles.original: ...step into my world, welcome to hell.
subtitles.english: ...step into my world, welcome to hell.

subtitles.original: Sinking down in your deep black...
subtitles.english: Sinking down in your deep black...

subtitles.original: We fall, we break...
subtitles.english: We fall, we break...

subtitles.original: ...we drown in fire.
subtitles.english: ...we drown in fire.

subtitles.original: Lost inside this dark desire.
subtitles.english: Lost inside this dark desire.

subtitles.original: No love, no faith...
subtitles.english: No love, no faith...

subtitles.original: ...just you and I...
subtitles.english: ...just you and I...

subtitles.original: ...dancing to the end of time.
subtitles.english: ...dancing to the end of time.

subtitles.original: Ba la la la la la la la...
subtitles.english: Ba la la la la la la la...

subtitles.original: Ba la la la la la la la...
subtitles.english: Ba la la la la la la la...

subtitles.original: Ba la la la la la la la...
subtitles.english: Ba la la la la la la la...

subtitles.original: ...end of time, end of time, end of time. Ba la la la la la la la...
subtitles.english: ...end of time, end of time, end of time. Ba la la la la la la la...

subtitles.original: I still blame myself for this haze...
subtitles.english: I still blame myself for this haze...

subtitles.original: ...shame that overflows, it never dissipates.
subtitles.english: ...shame that overflows, it never dissipates.

subtitles.original: I let words unsaid rot slowly, tainted and unholy...
subtitles.english: I let words unsaid rot slowly, tainted and unholy...

subtitles.original: ...no don't say...
subtitles.english: ...no don't say...

subtitles.original: Watch, wait, cold steel pressed against your neck.
subtitles.english: Watch, wait, cold steel pressed against your neck.

subtitles.original: Ba la la la la la la la...
subtitles.english: Ba la la la la la la la...

subtitles.original: ...end of time, end of time, end of time.
subtitles.english: ...end of time, end of time, end of time.

subtitles.original: One last breath before we die...
subtitles.english: One last breath before we die...

subtitles.original: ...the sight of you intoxicates...
subtitles.english: ...the sight of you intoxicates...

subtitles.original: Say a prayer, pass the time to confess...
subtitles.english: Say a prayer, pass the time to confess...
